title: Focus Group Discussion-Based Education for Strengthening Practical Competencies in Pharmaceutical Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical management theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Intensive training for in-service professionals in smartphone-limited tech environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core competencies required in the pharmaceutical management process
Learners can propose solutions to real-world pharmaceutical management issues through focus group discussions
Learners can collaborate with peers to perform learning activities even in resource-constrained technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
